TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EventWaitHandleSecurity extends System.Security.AccessControl.NativeObjectSecurity
Public NotInheritable Class EventWaitHandleSecurity Inherits NativeObjectSecurity

summary.span: 表示套用至具名系統等候控制代碼 (Wait Handle) 的 Windows 存取控制安全性。

span.span: Represents the Windows access control security applied to a named system wait handle.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件指定存取權限的具名的系統等候控制代碼，且也指定稽核嘗試存取的方式。An object specifies access rights for a named system wait handle, and also specifies the way access attempts are audited. 等候控制代碼的存取權限會由每個存取規則的規則，以表示物件。Access rights to the wait handle are expressed as rules, with each access rule represented by an object. 每個稽核規則由物件。Each auditing rule is represented by an object. 這會反映基礎的 Windows 安全性系統，其中每個安全性實體物件都有最多一個判別存取控制清單 (DACL) 控制存取安全的物件，並最多一個系統存取控制清單 (SACL) 指定的權限稽核嘗試。This mirrors the underlying Windows security system, in which each securable object has at most one discretionary access control list (DACL) that controls access to the secured object, and at most one system access control list (SACL) that specifies which access attempts are audited. DACL，SACL 會排序清單的指定存取和稽核使用者和群組的存取控制項目 (ACE)。The DACL and SACL are ordered lists of access control entries (ACE) that specify access and auditing for users and groups. 或物件可能代表一個以上的 ACE。An or object might represent more than one ACE. > [!NOTE] > 物件可代表本機等候控制代碼或具名的系統等候控制代碼。An object can represent a local wait handle or a named system wait handle. Windows 存取控制安全性是有意義，只會針對具名的系統等候控制代碼。Windows access control security is meaningful only for named system wait handles. ， ，和類別隱藏 Acl 和 Ace 的實作詳細資料。The , , and classes hide the implementation details of ACLs and ACEs. 它們可讓您忽略十七不同的 ACE 類型，並正確地維護繼承和存取權限傳播的複雜性。They allow you to ignore the seventeen different ACE types and the complexity of correctly maintaining inheritance and propagation of access rights. 這些物件也會設計是為了避免下列常見的存取控制項錯誤：These objects are also designed to prevent the following common access control errors: - 建立與 null 的 DACL 的安全性描述元。Creating a security descriptor with a null DACL. DACL 的 null 參考可讓任何使用者新增到物件，也有可能產生的阻絕服務攻擊的存取規則。A null reference to a DACL allows any user to add access rules to an object, potentially creating a denial-of-service attack. 新物件永遠會以空的 DACL，它會拒絕所有使用者的所有存取啟動。A new object always starts with an empty DACL, which denies all access for all users. - 違反 Ace 的標準順序。Violating the canonical ordering of ACEs. 如果 DACL 中的 ACE 清單不會保持在標準順序，使用者可能會不小心指定存取受保護的物件。If the ACE list in the DACL is not kept in the canonical order, users might inadvertently be given access to the secured object. 比方說，拒絕的存取權限必須永遠出現之前允許的存取權限。For example, denied access rights must always appear before allowed access rights. 物件會在內部維護正確的順序。 objects maintain the correct order internally. - 管理安全性描述元旗標，它應該只資源管理員的控制下。Manipulating security descriptor flags, which should be under resource manager control only. - 建立無效的 ACE 旗標組合。Creating invalid combinations of ACE flags. - 管理繼承的 Ace。Manipulating inherited ACEs. 繼承和傳用是由資源管理員，以回應變更您對存取和稽核規則處理。Inheritance and propagation are handled by the resource manager, in response to changes you make to access and audit rules. - 插入 Acl 無意義的 Ace。Inserting meaningless ACEs into ACLs. 不支援.NET 安全性物件的唯一功能是危險的活動，應避免大部分的應用程式開發人員，如下所示：The only capabilities not supported by the .NET security objects are dangerous activities that should be avoided by the majority of application developers, such as the following: - 通常由資源管理員執行的低階工作。Low-level tasks that are normally performed by the resource manager. - 加入或移除存取控制項目不會維護標準順序的方式。Adding or removing access control entries in ways that do not maintain the canonical ordering. 若要修改具名的等候控制代碼的 Windows 存取控制安全性，請使用方法來取得物件。To modify Windows access control security for a named wait handle, use the method to get the object. 加入和移除規則，來修改安全性物件，然後使用方法來重新附加它。Modify the security object by adding and removing rules, and then use the method to reattach it. > [!IMPORTANT] > 您所做的變更物件不會影響具名的等候控制代碼的存取層級直到您呼叫方法，以更改的安全性物件指派到具名的等候控制代碼。Changes you make to an object do not affect the access levels of the named wait handle until you call the method to assign the altered security object to the named wait handle. 若要從一個等候控制代碼複製存取控制安全性，到另一個，使用方法來取得表示第一個等候控制代碼的存取和稽核規則的物件，然後使用方法或建構函式可接受物件，這些規則將第二個等候控制代碼。To copy access control security from one wait handle to another, use the method to get an object representing the access and audit rules for the first wait handle, and then use the method, or a constructor that accepts an object, to assign those rules to the second wait handle. 中的安全性描述元定義語言 (SDDL) 投資的使用者可以使用方法，以設定存取規則命名為的等候控制代碼，而方法，以取得字串，代表 SDDL 格式中的存取規則。Users with an investment in the security descriptor definition language (SDDL) can use the method to set access rules for a named wait handle, and the method to obtain a string that represents the access rules in SDDL format. 建議您不要開發新項目。This is not recommended for new development. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範之間的分離規則和規則，並顯示相容的規則中的權限的組合。The following code example demonstrates the separation between rules and rules, and shows the combination of rights in compatible rules. 此範例會建立物件、 將規則，允許和拒絕各種權限目前的使用者，並顯示規則的結果組。The example creates an object, adds rules that allow and deny various rights for the current user, and displays the resulting pair of rules. 此範例會允許新的權限為目前的使用者，並顯示結果，顯示新的權限，系統會合併與現有規則。The example then allows new rights for the current user and displays the result, showing that the new rights are merged with the existing rule. > [!NOTE] > 此範例不會附加安全性物件至物件。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 中可以找到附加安全性物件的範例和。Examples that attach security objects can be found in and . [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity.AddAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity.AddAccessRule/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity.AddAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity.AddAccessRule/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用預設值，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with default values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新物件一律開頭空白的判別存取清單 (DACL)，它會拒絕所有使用者的所有存取。A new object always starts with an empty discretionary access list (DACL), which denies all access for all users.

exception.span: Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition 上不支援這個類別。

span.span: This class is not supported on Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property AccessRightType As Type
public: virtual property Type ^ AccessRightType { Type ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 類別用來表示存取權限的列舉型別。

span.span: Gets the enumeration type that the class uses to represent access rights.

value.span: 物件，表示 列舉型別。

span.span: A object representing the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別衍生自類別覆寫屬性，並傳回它們以表示的存取權限的類型。Classes that derive from the class override the property and return the type they use to represent access rights. 當您使用陣列或包含多個類型的安全性物件的集合時，使用這個屬性來判斷要用於每個安全性物件的正確的列舉類型。When you work with arrays or collections that contain multiple types of security objects, use this property to determine the correct enumeration type to use with each security object.

param.name: identityReference

span.span: An that identifies the user or group the rule applies to.

param.name: accessMask
param.span: 值的位元組合，指定允許或拒絕的存取權限 (轉型成整數)。

span.span: A bitwise combination of values specifying the access rights to allow or deny, cast to an integer.

summary.span: 以指定的存取權限、存取控制和旗標，為指定的使用者建立新的存取控制規則。

span.span: Creates a new access control rule for the specified user, with the specified access rights, access control, and flags.

returns.span: 物件，表示指定之使用者的指定權限。

span.span: An object representing the specified rights for the specified user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立存取控制規則的建議的方式是使用的建構函式類別。The recommended way to create access control rules is to use the constructors of the class. > [!NOTE] > 雖然繼承和傳播旗標是無意義的具名事件，就仍然可以指定它們。Although inheritance and propagation flags are meaningless for named events, it is still possible to specify them. 這不是建議，因為它不必要地變得非常複雜的維護的規則，例如藉由干擾原本是相容的規則的組合。This is not recommended, because it needlessly complicates the maintenance of rules, for example by interfering with the combination of rules that would otherwise be compatible.

exception.span: 、、 或 會指定無效的值。

param.name: rule

summary.span: 搜尋可合併新規則的相符存取控制規則。

span.span: Searches for a matching access control rule with which the new rule can be merged.

summary.span: 如果找不到，就加入新規則。

span.span: If none are found, adds the new rule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會搜尋具有相同的使用者或群組及相同的規則為`rule`。The method searches for rules with the same user or group and the same as `rule`. 如果找不到，`rule`加入。If none are found, `rule` is added. 如果找到相符的規則是中的權限`rule`會合併與現有的規則。If a matching rule is found, the rights in `rule` are merged with the existing rule. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範之間的分離規則和規則，並顯示相容的規則中的權限的組合。The following code example demonstrates the separation between rules and rules, and shows the combination of rights in compatible rules. 此範例會建立物件、 將規則，允許和拒絕各種權限目前的使用者，並顯示規則的結果組。The example creates an object, adds rules that allow and deny various rights for the current user, and displays the resulting pair of rules. 此範例會允許新的權限為目前的使用者，並顯示結果，顯示新的權限，系統會合併與現有規則。The example then allows new rights for the current user and displays the result, showing that the new rights are merged with the existing rule. > [!NOTE] > 此範例不會附加安全性物件至物件。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 中可以找到附加安全性物件的範例和。Examples that attach security objects can be found in and . summary.span: 以指定要套用規則的使用者的方式，建立新的稽核規則、要稽核的存取權限以及觸發該稽核規則的結果。

span.span: The return type of the method is the base class, , but the return value can be cast safely to the derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要建立的稽核規則的建議的方式是使用的建構函式類別。The recommended way to create audit rules is to use the constructors of the class. > [!NOTE] > 雖然繼承和傳播旗標是無意義的具名事件，就仍然可以指定它們。Although inheritance and propagation flags are meaningless for named events, it is still possible to specify them. 這不是建議，因為它不必要地變得非常複雜的維護的規則，例如藉由干擾原本是相容的規則的組合。This is not recommended, because it needlessly complicates the maintenance of rules, for example by interfering with the combination of rules that would otherwise be compatible.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool RemoveAccessRule(class System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleAccessRule rule) cil managed
Public Function RemoveAccessRule (rule As EventWaitHandleAccessRule) As Boolean

param.name: rule
param.span: ，其會指定要搜尋的使用者和 ，以及必須與相符的規則 (如果找到的話) 相容的繼承和傳用旗標集合。

span.span: An that specifies the user and to search for, and a set of inheritance and propagation flags that a matching rule, if found, must be compatible with.

param.span: 如果找到的話，指定從相容的規則中移除此權限。

span.span: Specifies the rights to remove from the compatible rule, if found.

summary.span: 搜尋具有與指定之存取規則相同的使用者和 (允許或拒絕) 以及具有相容的繼承和傳用旗標的存取控制規則。如果找到這樣的規則，則會移除指定之存取規則中所包含的權限。

span.span: Searches for an access control rule with the same user and (allow or deny) as the specified access rule, and with compatible inheritance and propagation flags; if such a rule is found, the rights contained in the specified access rule are removed from it.

returns.span: 如果找到相容的規則，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if a compatible rule is found; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前擁有相同的使用者和相同的規則會搜尋視為`rule`。The current is searched for a rule that has the same user and the same value as `rule`. 如果找到任何這類規則，會採取任何動作，而且方法會傳回`false`。If no such rule is found, no action is taken, and the method returns `false`. 如果找到比對規則，其繼承和相容性旗標會檢查在指定的旗標與相容性的`rule`。If matching rules are found, their inheritance and compatibility flags are checked for compatibility with the flags specified in `rule`. 如果找到不相容的規則，會採取任何動作，而且方法會傳回`false`。If no compatible rule is found, no action is taken, and the method returns `false`. 如果找到具有相容的旗標的規則，在指定的權限`rule`移除了相容的規則，而且方法會傳回`true`。If a rule with compatible flags is found, the rights specified in `rule` are removed from the compatible rule, and the method returns `true`. 如果`rule`指定不相容的規則中包含的權限，就會採取任何動作，與這些權限。If `rule` specifies rights not contained in the compatible rule, no action is taken with respect to those rights. 如果從相容的規則會移除所有的權限，整個規則會移除從目前物件。If all rights are removed from the compatible rule, the entire rule is removed from the current object. > [!IMPORTANT] > 雖然您可以藉由建立它們與指定之事件的存取規則、 繼承和傳播旗標，這不建議使用方法。Although you can specify inheritance and propagation flags for event access rules, by creating them with the method, this is not recommended. 繼承和傳播具名事件，無意義，請存取規則的維護更為複雜。Inheritance and propagation have no meaning for named events, and they make the maintenance of access rules more complicated. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法中移除的權限從規則中物件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to remove rights from an rule in an object. 它也會顯示中的其他權限`rule`都會被忽略。It also shows that other rights in `rule` are ignored. 此範例會建立物件並將加入規則，允許和拒絕目前使用者的各種權限。The example creates an object and adds rules that allow and deny various rights for the current user. 權限允許包含， ，和。The rights allowed include , , and . 這個範例會建立新的規則，目前的使用者，包括和權限，並使用與該規則方法移除從規則中物件。The example then creates a new rule for the current user, including and rights, and uses that rule with the method to remove from the rule in the object. 中由左至右`rule`會被忽略。The right in `rule` is ignored. > [!NOTE] > 此範例不會附加安全性物件至物件。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 中可以找到附加安全性物件的範例和。Examples that attach security objects can be found in and . [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity.RemoveAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity.RemoveAccessRule/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity.RemoveAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity.RemoveAccessRule/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Searches for all access control rules with the same user and (allow or deny) as the specified rule and, if found, removes them.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前具備相同的使用者和相同的規則會搜尋視為`rule`。The current is searched for rules that have the same user and the same value as `rule`. 指定的任何權限`rule`時執行這項搜尋將會被忽略。Any rights specified by `rule` are ignored when performing this search. 會移除所有比對規則。All matching rules are removed. 如果找不到任何對應的規則，會不採取任何動作。If no matching rules are found, no action is taken. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示方法移除符合使用者的所有規則和，略過權限。The following code example shows that the method removes all rules that match user and , ignoring rights. 此範例會建立物件、 將規則，允許和拒絕各種權限目前的使用者，並接著將合併到其他的權限規則。The example creates an object, adds rules that allow and deny various rights for the current user, and then merges additional rights into the rule. 這個範例會建立新的規則，可讓目前的使用者取得擁有權，並使用該規則，移除規則從物件。The example then creates a new rule that allows the current user to take ownership, and uses that rule to remove the rule from the object. > [!NOTE] > 此範例不會附加安全性物件至物件。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 中可以找到附加安全性物件的範例和。Examples that attach security objects can be found in and . [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity.RemoveAccessRuleAll#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity.RemoveAccessRuleAll/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity.RemoveAccessRuleAll#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity.RemoveAccessRuleAll/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RemoveAccessRuleSpecific(class System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleAccessRule rule) cil managed

param.name: rule
param.span: 要移除的 。

span.span: The to remove.

summary.span: 搜尋與指定規則完全相符的存取控制規則，如果找到的話，便加以移除。

span.span: Searches for an access control rule that exactly matches the specified rule and, if found, removes it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此規則會移除它完全符合時，才`rule`中所有詳細資料，包括旗標。The rule is removed only if it exactly matches `rule` in all details, including flags. 其他規則具有相同的使用者和不會受到影響。Other rules with the same user and are not affected. > [!IMPORTANT] > 規則表示一或多個基礎存取控制項目 (ACE)，而且這些項目分割或修改使用者存取安全性規則時，視需要結合。A rule represents one or more underlying access control entries (ACE), and these entries are split or combined as necessary when you modify the access security rules for a user. 因此，規則不再存在於在特定的表單時加入，然後在此情況下方法無法將其移除。Thus, a rule might no longer exist in the specific form it had when it was added, and in that case the method cannot remove it. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示方法需要完全相符，才能移除規則，與規則，以允許和拒絕權限會彼此獨立。The following code example shows that the method requires an exact match in order to remove a rule, and that rules to allow and deny rights are independent of each other. 此範例會建立物件、 將規則，允許和拒絕各種權限目前的使用者，並接著將合併到其他的權限存取規則。The example creates an object, adds rules that allow and deny various rights for the current user, and then merges additional rights into the access rule. 此範例接著會將傳遞的原始規則方法，並顯示結果，並顯示不會刪除。The example then passes the original rule to the method, and displays the results, showing that nothing is deleted. 此範例接著會建構規則符合規則中物件，並已成功使用方法來移除規則。The example then constructs a rule that matches the rule in the object, and successfully uses the method to remove the rule. > [!NOTE] > 此範例不會附加安全性物件至物件。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 中可以找到附加安全性物件的範例和。Examples that attach security objects can be found in and . [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity.RemoveAccessRuleSpecific#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity.RemoveAccessRuleSpecific/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity.RemoveAccessRuleSpecific#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity.RemoveAccessRuleSpecific/VB/source.vb#1)]

returns.span: 如果找到相容的規則，則為 ，否則為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前搜尋具有相同的使用者的稽核規則`rule`。The current is searched for an audit rule that has the same user as `rule`. 如果找到任何這類規則，會採取任何動作，而且方法會傳回`false`。If no such rule is found, no action is taken, and the method returns `false`. 如果找到比對規則，其繼承和相容性旗標會檢查在指定的旗標與相容性的`rule`。If matching rules are found, their inheritance and compatibility flags are checked for compatibility with the flags specified in `rule`. 如果找到不相容的規則，會採取任何動作，而且方法會傳回`false`。If no compatible rule is found, no action is taken, and the method returns `false`. 如果找到具有相容的旗標的規則，在指定的權限`rule`移除了相容的規則，而且方法會傳回`true`。If a rule with compatible flags is found, the rights specified in `rule` are removed from the compatible rule, and the method returns `true`. 如果`rule`指定不相容的規則中包含的權限，就會採取任何動作，與這些權限。If `rule` specifies rights not contained in the compatible rule, no action is taken with respect to those rights. 如果從相容的規則會移除所有的權限，整個規則會移除從目前物件。If all rights are removed from the compatible rule, the entire rule is removed from the current object. > [!IMPORTANT] > 雖然您可以藉由建立它們與指定之事件的稽核規則、 繼承和傳播旗標，這不建議使用方法。Although you can specify inheritance and propagation flags for event audit rules, by creating them with the method, this is not recommended. 繼承和傳播具名事件，無意義，請稽核規則的維護更為複雜。Inheritance and propagation have no meaning for named events, and they make the maintenance of audit rules more complicated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此規則會移除它完全符合時，才`rule`中所有詳細資料，包括旗標。The rule is removed only if it exactly matches `rule` in all details, including flags. 不會影響同一個使用者的其他稽核規則。Other audit rules for the same user are not affected. > [!IMPORTANT] > 規則表示一或多個基礎存取控制項目 (ACE)，而且這些項目分割或修改使用者的安全性稽核規則時，視需要結合。A rule represents one or more underlying access control entries (ACE), and these entries are split or combined as necessary when you modify the audit security rules for a user. 因此，規則不再存在於在特定的表單時加入，然後在此情況下方法無法將其移除。Thus, a rule might no longer exist in the specific form it had when it was added, and in that case the method cannot remove it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有使用者符合指定之規則的存取規則`rule`加入。If there are no access rules whose user matches the specified rule, `rule` is added. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何方法會取代為指定的比對的規則比對使用者的所有規則。The following code example shows how the method replaces all rules for the matching user with the rule specified for the match. 此範例會建立物件並將加入規則，允許和拒絕目前使用者的各種權限。The example creates an object and adds rules that allow and deny various rights for the current user. 這個範例會建立新的規則，可讓您目前的使用者完整控制，並使用方法，以使用新的規則來取代這兩個現有的規則。The example then creates a new rule that allows the current user full control, and uses the method to replace both of the existing rules with the new rule. > [!NOTE] > 此範例不會附加安全性物件至物件。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 中可以找到附加安全性物件的範例和。Examples that attach security objects can be found in and . [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity.ResetAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity.ResetAccessRule/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity.ResetAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity.ResetAccessRule/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的規則有，這個方法的效果是要移除所有規則所指定的使用者，將其取代為指定的規則。If the specified rule has , the effect of this method is to remove all rules for the specified user, replacing them with the specified rule. 如果指定的規則有，則所有規則指定的使用者都取代成指定的規則。If the specified rule has , all rules for the specified user are replaced with the specified rule. 如果沒有規則的使用者和符合指定之規則`rule`加入。If there are no rules whose user and match the specified rule, `rule` is added. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何方法移除符合這兩個使用者的所有規則和的`rule`，取代它們與`rule`。The following code example shows how the method removes all rules that match both the user and the of `rule`, replacing them with `rule`. 此範例會建立物件並將加入規則，允許和拒絕目前使用者的各種權限。The example creates an object and adds rules that allow and deny various rights for the current user. 這個範例會建立新的規則，可讓您目前的使用者完整控制，並使用方法來取代現有使用新的規則的規則。The example then creates a new rule that allows the current user full control, and uses the method to replace the existing rule with the new rule. 不受影響的規則，拒絕存取。The rule that denies access is not affected. > [!NOTE] > 此範例不會附加安全性物件至物件。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 中可以找到附加安全性物件的範例和。Examples that attach security objects can be found in and .
